title: My Profile
description: This is my Portfolio Website, where I provide a brief introduction about myself, highlight my professional experiences, and share my contact details. Additionally, there is a form that allows anyone to send me a message directly via email.

KeyRoleDetails.details: Built the website using Next.js, React hooks, and JSON for data
Learned Next.js and debugged independently
Created a responsive, user-friendly interface

KeyAchievementDetails.details: Used JSON for lightweight data management.
Deployed successfully using GitHub Actions to GitHub Pages
Created a professional portfolio showcasing skills and projects.

title: Game Development
description: This project is a classic casino game using Unity, integrating AI-powered NPCs with interactive dialogues generated through Large Language Models (LLMs) to create a unique player experience. The result was a revamped game that combines gameplay with cutting-edge conversational capabilities.

KeyRoleDetails.details: Integrated a Large Language Model to power NPC behaviors, decision-making, and interactive dialogues
Worked in Implementing core gameplay mechanics
Integrating the game with server-side logic for features like player authentication, data storage, and real-time interactions
Designing user interfaces that are intuitive, user-friendly, and aesthetically pleasing
Working effectively with artists, designers, and programmers to ensure a cohesive game experience

KeyAchievementDetails.details: Quickly adapted to Unity's game development environment, learning C# scripting, asset management, and scene design within a short timeframe
Successfully integrated a Large Language Model LLM to power NPC decision-making and interactions
Streamlined game logic and API integration, ensuring smooth performance

title: Food Cost Management
description: This system is a comprehensive Restaurant Management System with features for Point of Sale (POS), Inventory, and Payroll Generation. The system aims to streamline operations, enhance customer experience, and improve staff efficiency

KeyRoleDetails.details: Converted the existing .net 2 mvc app to .net 6 and also involved in creating the new module in react
Converting the existing web services into rest api in nest JS.
Involve in creating a separate new application written in Java and angular
Take responsibility for the given module, communicate with the PM for the requirements and coordinate with the team members to complete the task
Created architecture for the API in next js
Worked in Jira and agile methodology and also involved in the code review process

KeyAchievementDetails.details: Experience with EC2 servers, S3 buckets and also used Azure and GIT for CI/CD pipeline
Successfully converted the project from old version of .net to the latest .net 6

title: Trasndoclink Cargo Logistic
description: This system is a comprehensive solution designed to streamline the process of managing cargo shipments. It enables users to create and manage detailed records of cargo shipments, including invoices, cargo information, and real-time location tracking. This system aims to provide efficient and accurate cargo management capabilities, facilitating seamless communication between shippers, carriers, and customers, ultimately enhancing overall supply chain operations.

KeyRoleDetails.details: Coordinated with business analysts for the project requirements, creating the technical document.
Communicated with cross-functional teams, including QA, UI/UX, and product management, to ensure smooth project execution
Implemented scrum, to enhance teamʼs productivity and efficiency
Created architecture for the project and helped team members to resolve the task and also involved in the code review process

KeyAchievementDetails.details: As a team lead, maintained the communication channel among the team members and to develop software for cargo logistics
Implemented the Azure for kanban board and CI/CD pipeline for the smooth deployment process.

title: Software for Multi Store Ecommerce
description: This system is tailored to meet the demands of a multi-store e-commerce platform, seamlessly integrating merchant management tools with an intuitive dashboard to track accounts and inventory. For consumers, we offer a user-friendly mobile application that provides an immersive shopping experience across multiple stores. This cohesive solution aims to streamline operations, enhance customer engagement, and drive business growth for merchants in a diverse retail landscape.

KeyRoleDetails.details: Created a mobile app with redux to handle the state management and sagas to handle the api calls
Design and develop the interactive interfaces such as user login, registration, cart, scrollable list, QRcode generation and read the data for QR scan.
Worked in API which was written in to process the data from the mobile app.

KeyAchievementDetails.details: Added a new module to the existing .net MVC web application which was developed in angular 9 and incorporated as an iframe
Worked in new technology, mobile app development in react native and .net core 2.0.
Enhanced the knowledge of state management and implemented the redux structure in mobile application and NGRX in Angular project

title: GBcare Case Management System
description: This system is designed to provide comprehensive and efficient medical assistance to nurses and healthcare professionals, ensuring they have access to the necessary resources and support to deliver high-quality patient care. It seamlessly integrates with existing health insurance systems, streamlining claims processing, billing, and reimbursement, while also offering a range of value-added services that cater to the unique needs of nursing staff. By providing timely and accurate medical assistance, this system aims to enhance nurse satisfaction, reduce administrative burdens, and promote better health outcomes for patients.

KeyRoleDetails.details: Worked as a Team lead, had to coordinate with business analysts for the requirement and create the task among the team members.
Involved in helping the team members and reviewing their code in order to maintain the code structure
Converted the existing application to .net MVC with Domain Driven Design and SSRS
The complex business logics were written stored procedures and views in the database in order to optimize the reporting system
Conducted extensive testing and debugging to ensure system stability and accuracy of the data processing
Worked on support to handle the bugs after the system is being deployed.

KeyAchievementDetails.details: Lead a group of 5 developers in a project in .net MVC undertaking the SDLC of the whole project
Had an experience with Web API, and SQLBI for reporting (SSRS)
Implemented robust and scalable solutions to handle complex health data, workflows, and compliance requirements
Successfully delivered a comprehensive health case management system within a given time frame and received a positive feedback from clients

title: Loyalty Program for Retail Shop
description: This System is an innovative platform designed to reward and engage loyal customers of the iconic retail brand. This system aims to create a personalized experience for each customer, fostering long-term relationships and driving repeat business.

It offers a comprehensive solution for schools to streamline their administrative tasks and improve overall efficiency
